message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $140 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $130 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $135. How about we split the difference?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $130 is a good price for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you meet me at $130?
